titleStmt.title: SII 12.201: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 201. (A.R. No. 307 of 1913). CHIDAMBARAM, CHIDAMBARAM TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE THIRD PRĀKĀRA OF THE NAṬARĀJA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record of the 17th year refers to the gift of some land in Vaḍaśēmaṅgalam in Tiruvindaḷūr-nāḍu, a subdivision of Rājādhirāja-vaḷanāḍu which Tittikka-Āḍuvār of Kūḍal purchased from Tiruchchiṟṟambala-Mūvēndavēḷār of Kārikuḍi for providing additional offerings during the five extra sandis to the god Dakshiṇāmūrti in the temple of Mūlasthānam-Uḍaiyār at Chidambaram for which provision had been made in another record from the same place (No. 152 above dated in the 7th year of the chief).
The inscription was ordered to be engraved on the wall called ‘Vikramaśōḻaṉtirumāḷigai’ by the officer Śōḻakōṉ.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . sakalabhuvaṉacakravattikaḷ śrīkopperuñciṅkatevarkku yāṇṭu 10 7vatu coḻa koṉ Olai . teṉṉavaṉ brahma mārāyarum jayatuṅkappallavarayarum tillaiyampalappallava rayarum
Uṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil śrīmāheśvarak kaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum śrī kāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum sāmutāyañ ceyvārkaḷum koyilnāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu ceyvār
kaḷum kaṇakkarum kaṇṭu viṭu tantatāvatu . śrīmulasthāṉamuṭaiyār Amutu ceytaruḷum cantikaḷum Appamum Ikkoyil takṣiṇāmuttidevar Amutu ceytaruḷavum Itukku muṉpu Amutu ceyta ruḷivarukiṟa canti muṉṟum
nikki Eṟa Amutuceytaruḷa mutalkoṇṭa canti Aiñcukku kūṭaluṭaiyār tittikka Āṭuvār vilai koṇṭu tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka viṭṭu kalveṭṭiṉa nilattukku Amutuceytaruḷi varukiṟa
veṇpoṉakattukkum paruppupoṉakattukkum Appattukkum meleṟṟamāka pālppoṉaka mum Appamum ṇṭaṉappamum veccamutu payaṟum Iḷanirum cela pālum Amutu ceytaruḷave
ṇṭum nivantattukku Ivar kārikuṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuventaveḷār pakkal rājādhirāja vaḷanāṭṭu tiruvintaḷūrnāṭṭu vaṭacemaṅkalattu vilaikoṇṭa nilam patiṉālemukkāle nālumā muk
kāṇiyum Ūrnattattu maṉaikaḷukkum vilaikoṇṭa sādhaṉamum mulasādhaṉamum Innilamum maṉaikaḷum tirunāmattukkāṇiyākak kuṭuttapaṭikku sādhaṉamum tirukkaiOṭṭip paṇṭārattu Oṭukkavum . Innilam
tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyākat tevar tirumukam Eḻutiṉapaṭiye patiṉeḻāvatu mutal tevatāṉamum tirunāmattukkāṇiyākak kaikkoṇṭu palapaṇi nivantakkāṟarkku jivitam Aṭaikkalam . Ippaṭikku
vikkiramacoḻaṉ tirumāḷikaiyile kal veṭṭavum caṭavatākap paṇṇuvate . Ippaṭi ceyyappaṇṇuvate . Ivai coḻakoṉ Eḻuttu Eṉṟum vanta Evaṟ tiṭṭuppaṭi kalveṭṭiyatu .
Digital edition of SII 12.201 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
